    • Method Detail

      • serializeLeague

        public void serializeLeague(java.lang.String name,
                            int numOfTeams,
                            java.lang.String rules,
                            java.lang.String trade,
                            int QB,
                            int WR,
                            int RB,
                            int TE,
                            int bench,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Team> listTeams,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Player> listPlayers)
        Save the active league. performed after nearly every operation.
        Parameters:
        name - the league name to be saved
        numOfTeams - the number of teams in the league
        rules - the scoring rules of the league
        trade - any pending accepted trade in the league
        QB - the maximum QBs allowed in the league
        WR - the maximum WRs allowed in the league
        RB - the maximum RBs allowed in the league
        TE - the maximum TEs allowed in the league
        bench - the maximum bench players allowed in addition to starters
        listTeams - the teams in the league
        listPlayers - the player list of the league
